timeline.bodyText: If we want to make this change, it should go to master, branch-2 first right?

replies.bodyText: I saw the warning in branch-1 only after HBASE-24174. I can forward-port to branch-2 and master. But as you said it is supressed, dilemma...
replies.author: Reidddddd

replies.bodyText: Right, it is suppressed there. Either we can backport suppressed one or forward port this to branch-2+ and remove suppression there. Sure, let's see QA 👍

timeline.bodyText: btw, this if condition is an enhancement for this patch? is it necessary?
timeline.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText:
Yes, it is, to avoid unnecessary refresh. If authorization is disabled, then no need to refresh it which it is time consuming.
We should forward-port this patch to branch-2+ and master as well, quite some changes.
replies.author: Reidddddd
